glg2d

Class G2DGLEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • glg2d.G2DGLSimpleEventListener
      • glg2d.G2DGLEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, GLEventListener

    public class G2DGLEventListener
extends G2DGLSimpleEventListener
    Helps wrap the GLGraphics2D object within the JOGL framework.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class glg2d.G2DGLSimpleEventListener

    • Constructor Detail

      • G2DGLEventListener

        public G2DGLEventListener(JComponent baseComponent)
        Creates a new listener that will paint using the baseComponent on each call to G2DGLSimpleEventListener.display(GLAutoDrawable). The provided baseComponent is used to provide default font, backgroundColor, etc. to the GLGraphics2D object. It is also used for width, height of the viewport in OpenGL.

    • Method Detail

      • paintGL

        protected void paintGL(GLGraphics2D g2d)
        Paints using the GLGraphics2D object. This could be forwarded to any code that expects to draw using the Java2D framework.

        Currently is paints the component provided, turning off double-buffering in the RepaintManager to force drawing directly to the Graphics2D object.

        Overrides:
        paintGL in class G2DGLSimpleEventListener

      • isPaintingDirtyRects

        protected boolean isPaintingDirtyRects()

      • paintDirtyRects

        protected void paintDirtyRects()
